accountDataDescription: Możesz zmienić tu adres e-mail i hasło do twojego konta.

activityHistoryDescription: Here you will find activity such as login attempts, logouts and access management.
homeDescription: Welcome to your account settings. Here you can change your password, view your account activity history, or add new log access.
passwordMaxLengthError: The password must contain at most 255 characters.
passwordMinLengthError: The password must contain at least 8 characters.
repeatPasswordError: The password must be the same in both fields.
